I have a decent Mathewson Portrait SGC 30 available for sale/trade.  I would prefer to trade.  Looking specifically for Lajoie Portraits, HOF's and commons with mid-tier backs.  If interested, please send me a PM or email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].  Price below is net dlvd.  *This is card is cross-posted on eBay with a BIN*

Mathewson SGC 30 - $555
